sentences.en: Her trusting smile melted his heart.
sentences.cn: 她那信任的微笑使他的心变软了。

sentences.en: If you're too trusting, other people will take advantage of you.
sentences.cn: 如果你过于轻信，其他人就会打你的主意。

sentences.en: He was too trusting—or, to put it another way , he had no head for business.
sentences.cn: 他太轻信人了—或者换个说法，他没有商业头脑。
